title: Bug 18934: Scrollbars should be disabled in ImageAnalyzer example
OB: In the ImageAnalyzer example, the scrollbars are enabled and can be moved, but they do not have any effect. When opening a small image, such as an icon, the scrollbars are misleading because they do not function.
EB: The scrollbars in the ImageAnalyzer example should be disabled when opening a small image, as they are currently misleading and do not serve any purpose.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Build F2 (20020602)Redhat 7.2, GTK2KDE 2.210(GTK2 only). 
2. Open the ImageAnalyzer example. 
3. Notice that the scrollbars are enabled and can be moved, but they do not have any effect. 
4. Open a small image, such as an icon, and observe that the scrollbars are misleading because they do not provide any functionality.
